short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate personalized explanations and examples to enhance your online learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The JoltEd Chrome Extension provides personalized explanation generation and example provisioning of educational content with the aim to authentically increase students' interest and value in their learning. Simply highlight text, fill out the quick and easy form to personalize, and watch the text change on the web page in front of you.

For more information or to report issues, please visit our Github repository linked below.

https://github.com/ACCELab-UofT/JoltEd-Chrome-Extension
